title: CLDF dataset accompanying Auderset et al.'s "Subgrouping in a ‘dialect continuum’" from 2023
citation: Auderset, Sandra, Simon J. Greehnhill, Christian T. DiCanio, Eric W. Campbell. (2023) "Subgrouping in a `dialect continuum': A Bayesian phylogenetic analysis of the Mixtecan language family". Journal of Language Evolution, tbd
